original: Hetu anuppanno dhammo nahetussa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: hetu anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na anuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā upanissaye nava

original: Hetu uppādī dhammo nahetussa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: hetu uppādī dhammaḥ na hetussa na uppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā upanissaye nava
